HETA.F.summary: KHD Humboldt Wedag VermÃ¶gensverwaltungs-AG provides industrial plant equipment and services for the cement and mining industries in Germany. The company was formerly known as KHD Humboldt Wedag Industrial Services AG and changed its name to KHD Humboldt Wedag VermÃ¶gensverwaltungs-AG in July 2017. The company is based in Cologne, Germany.

SUR.DE.summary: Surteco Group SE develops, produces, and sells coated surface materials based on paper and plastic in Germany, rest of Europe, and North and South America. The company operates through Strategic Business Unit (SBU) Decoratives, SBU Technicals, and SBU Profiles segments. The SBU Decoratives segment offers edgebandings based on paper and plastic, finish foils based on paper, release papers, and decorative printing products. The SBU Technicals segment provides impregnated products, plastic foils, and hybrid and genuine metal foils. The SBU Profiles segment offers skirtings, LED strips, roller shutter systems, and technical extrusions. The SBU Paper segment offers dÃ©cor papers, finish foils, impregnated products, paper-based edgebandings, and release papers. It serves the wood-based, door and furniture, flooring, caravan, interior design, construction, trade floorlayers, and craft trade industries, as well as carpenters and artisan businesses. The company was formerly known as Surteco SE and changed its name to Surteco Group SE in July 2018. Surteco Group SE is based in Buttenwiesen, Germany.
